coding_practice.title: Number of Boomerangs
coding_practice.description:
You are given n points in the plane that are all distinct, where points[i] = [x_i, y_i]. A boomerang is a tuple of points (i, j, k) such that the distance between i and j equals the distance between i and k (the order of the tuple matters).

Return the number of boomerangs.
coding_practice.constraints:
n == points.length
1 <= n <= 500
points[i].length == 2
-10^4 <= x_i, y_i <= 10^4
All the points are unique.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 對每個點 (x1, y1) 遍歷所有其他點 (x2, y2) 並計算平方距離 d。
2. 使用字典 dist_count 記錄每個距離出現的次數。
3. 若某個距離出現 count 次，則可以組成 count * (count - 1) 個 boomerangs。
4. 對所有點累加結果，返回 total。
